intro: Welcome to Cozy Tiny Home, a warm and heart-melting decorating game where you can design the most adorable spaces imaginable - and fill them with sweet animal friends!
description:
Step into a pastel paradise where creativity meets comfort. In Cozy Tiny Home, every item tells a story - from soft cushions and glowing lamps to shelves packed with memories. Whether you’re decorating a snug study, a sunny living room, or a peaceful bedroom, each space becomes your own cozy retreat filled with charm, color, and serenity.


Relax and express yourself through endless decorating possibilities. Combine cute furniture, cheerful plants, and playful accessories to make your dream home come alive with warmth and personality. With cuddly cats, curious bunnies, and plenty of smiles, every moment feels like a cozy hug!


KEY FEATURES:
- Build and decorate your own cozy rooms in a cute, pastel world
- Invite adorable cats, bunnies, and other fluffy friends to share your space
- Hundreds of lovely furniture pieces, plants, and decorations to mix and match
- Soft, relaxing music and soothing atmosphere for pure comfort
- Endless creativity — design your dream home your way
- Perfect for players who love cozy vibes, cute animals, and relaxing design games
